data.title: The gods of mars : John carter of mars series, book 2.
data.meta_description: The Gods of Mars  is the second novel in Burroughs' Barsoom series. The setting is an inhabited, dying Mars, where the different races fight over dwindling resources. It is a frontier world full of honor, glory and desperation; lost cities and ancient secrets provide the landscape for heroic adventures.
